verses.name: Joshua 19:15
verses.text: And Kattath, and Nahallal, and Shimron, and Idalah, and Beth–lehem: twelve cities with their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 19:16
verses.text: This is the inheritance of the children of Zebulun according to their families, these cities with their villages.

verses.name: Joshua 19:17
verses.text: And the fourth lot came out to Issachar, for the children of Issachar according to their families.

verses.name: Joshua 19:18
verses.text: And their border was toward Jezreel, and Chesulloth, and Shunem,

verses.name: Joshua 19:19
verses.text: And Hapharaim, and Shion, and Anaharath,

verses.name: Joshua 19:20
verses.text: And Rabbith, and Kishion, and Abez,

verses.name: Joshua 19:21
verses.text: And Remeth, and En–gannim, and En–haddah, and Beth–pazzez;
